name: Exiled to the Void
description: A massive comet catastrophe has led to almost complete collapse of the humanity. Lead a group of lucky survivors and create a new civilization on the moons of Jupiter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
